thread.title: Coca-Cola calls on Blatter to resign now
thread.title_full: Coca-Cola calls on Blatter to resign now

title: Coca-Cola calls on Blatter to resign now
text:
> Top News Coca-Cola calls on Blatter to resign now FIFA President Sepp Blatter drives his car into the garage of the FIFA headquarters on his way to work in Zurich, Switzerland, Tuesday, Sept. 29, 2015. Blatter was questioned by Swiss investigators on Friday about why FIFA paid 2 million Swiss francs (about $2 million) to UEFA President Michel Platini in 2011 for work supposedly carried out at least nine years earlier. (AP Photo/Michael Probst)
